title: Are online classes harmful for students? - Quora

response.answer_text: In the present situation of countrywide lock down schools, colleges and other educational institutions are leftover with only one option to continue teaching, that is to provide online education to students. Online classes is a virtual alternative of live classes. It was a sudden shift for all students and educational institutions to educate students amidst lock down. This step was so sudden that their was no time for proper research about the pros and cons of online education in India. Here, on the basis of so far experience of online classes we can say.. The Pros of Online Education in India are: Students can learn from anywhere, at any timeSaves time and is also pocket friendlyStudents get to know about things going around the world.Students is free to learn at their own paceGives recognition of online degrees of studentsThe Cons of Online Education in India are: Chances of distraction of students are very highUnauthorized online courses are easy trap for studentsStudents cannot do courses that require labs/workshopsLong classes may adversely affect a students healthStudents become technology and gadget bound for educationThe exact answer to this question would be that online education is not that much harmful for students, as everything has its own pros and cons. If we closely study the the affect of online education on students we will be convinced by the fact that students who study seriously are growing smarter and smarter in terms of knowledge as well as in terms of technology.

The online classes are the only alternative left for the continuation of education during this pandemic. However, the constant use of electronic gadgets has created a concern about the harms of the continuous use of these tools. Since, the use of this technology cannot be abandoned, it becomes our duty to ensure that we take precautions to prevent ourselves from getting harmed. Among this, the universities are ensuring by several measures that even though the education is being continued, the students do not get harmed by this. Once such example of this approach is being introduced by Graphic Era University, wherein only a fixed amount of time is being spent by the students on the electronic devices. Even though the approach is online, they are made to take assignments and notes in the form of hard copy, ensuring that the lectures are not being missed and the students do not suffer either in studies or physically. Therefore, the harm can thus be lessened by taking preventive measures in this time of pandemic.

Today, online classes are going on everywhere. It is because considering today’s situation, online classes are the only solution. But online classes have certain drawbacks that are harmful to students like: It affects their eyes and leads to frequent headaches.It increases their dependency on gadgets like smartphones and laptops.They become lazy as they do not do any physical activity.But online classes provide guidance to students. Without these classes, students will start neglecting studies and will waste their time. Due to these classes, they have a particular schedule to follow like waking up early and taking their meals timely. In my view, online classes should be conducted but in a way that students can get time to play and can do fun activities. The duration of the classes should not be too long and the learning should be made fun.

There is always two sides of something. And online class is just like anyother. Students can learn a lot through online classes only if they pay close attention to the subject taught. But students Nature most likely doesn't go that way. Let us assume, few competitive students in the class take online classes seriously. They will be benefitted while others who don't take it seriously, are just wasting their time and internet resources. Looking into this topic on the whole, it depends on how the students take the online class
